manifest.name: Quadro
manifest.description: Qualitative Data Analysis (QDA) for social scientists. An open alternative to `MAXQDA` and `atlas.ti`, using Markdown to store data and research codes.
manifest.author: Chris Grieser (aka pseudometa)
